Row.Text: RESOURCES:
Greetings great leader. We represent [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We earnestly hope that we can forge a strong and lasting peace with your mighty empire.
Welcome to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! We awaited a strong partner for such a long time!
Pleased to meet you. Enjoy the kindness of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We earnestly seek your guidance.
Hallelujah! We heard about your mighty empire in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Make yourself at home.
Greetings from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! We would like to create strong partnership with your country!
Come in! We heard many stories about you. We are glad you visited [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Nice to see such a mighty ruler in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. I hope you have big plans for us!
Greetings. We are the people of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Treat us fairly and we shall have peace.
Hello passerby. You entered the territory of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We do not want any problems.
Good day. Nation of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] is open for new contacts. Be kind and we will get back at you.
Greetings stranger. What are you looking for in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
Hello! We did not expect any guests in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. What we can do for you?
Hi! We can see you are very tired after long journey to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Can we do something for you?
Greetings traveler. How did you find [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]? We have been avoiding any contacts so far.
Halt, Stranger! We are the mighty people of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Trifle with us at your peril! If you earn the privilege.
Whoa! Do not try to start war with [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We know how to defend our people!
Don't move stranger! We heard many stories about your kind in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]!
Mhmmm, so you say that you want to befriend with [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR], huh? That's very nice of you, but we don't trust any strangers!
What a coincidence! Our fortune-teller foresaw the coming of the end of the world. Is this your purpose in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
Well, well. We think, you have no interests in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Oh, gods! That's just what we needed! Bloodthirsty king of the world in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Different cultures can always benefit from each other.
Please, get to know our culture. It's important for us.
We can start cultural revolution in your country!
We are interested in exchanging some cultural artifacts. Do you have one?
Every culture is interesting. We want to know more about yours, too.
Strong culture is key to victory! And you want to conquest the world, right?
We want you to adopt our culture? Are you ok with that?
We have great military knowledge. You can increase the strength of your army.
Glorious battles are our way of life!
We can train special units for you. Come and check them out!
We studied arts of war. We can teach some unique techniques.
What about starting some war?
We heard you trained the greatest army in the world. We kinda like it.
Sometimes war is pointless. We can show you when.
We can help accelerate your civilization's growth.
We can provide enough food to feed your people.
We can see your people starving! We can help them.
We had good harvests this year, and we can share some resources with you.
Do you want to look at our food reserves?
We like exchanging things. We can provide you as much food as you want.
Check our fruits! Taste our vegetables! Smell our fish! Enjoy our spices!
We have many luxuries that can make your citizens happy.
Our riches can shame any mighty leader.
If you look for some luxuries, then you came to the right place!
We have enough gold to make anyone happy. Even such leader like you!
Luxuries, luxuries and once more luxuries! That's the key to co-existence.
The only thing, making people happy is money. Anyone who deny that should be exiled.
Our guilds, banks, mints or markets make dreams possible. What are your dreams?
We can help nurture your religious traditions.
Pray in our temples, and maybe gods will forgive you your sins!
If you are looking for forgiveness, then you came to the right place. Pray and repent.
Our sacred places are open for your people, and everyone who wants to pray.
We can talk to gods! Take this into account!
We are religious capital of the world. Anyone who deny that is a heretic and must burn on a stake!
Do you want to confess your sins?
We amassed some gold in our treasure. {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold for you from our nation.
Everyone needs money! Grab this {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold and go!
This {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold should help you.
Please, use this {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold wisely!
Don't forget to take {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold!
We want to gift you {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
We are in the good mood. {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold for you!
We want to give you a piece of treasured art worth {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Our cultural artifacts will be nice addition to your office. We lay {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture onto your hands.
{1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture is everything we have right now in our museums.
Admire our art! This {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture is yours now.
We sculptured {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for you. Present it to your people!
We have some spare {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for you.
This {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture should change your attitude towards us.
Take this cart filled with {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food to boost your developement.
Those containers with {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food are prepared for your people. Feed them.
Fresh {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food from our market is available for you.
Do you like local meals? {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food is prepared for you to taste it.
Maybe this {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food will strengthen our relationship?
We transported containers with {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food to your hometown.
{1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food is at your disposal. Share with your people!
Our religious artifacts are worth {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith. Take them, please.
Gods sent you {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith!
Our prophets pleased the gods, and they sent you {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
Please, take this sacred cross worth {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
We see a vague future with your participation. Maybe this {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith, will change your plans.
Gods decided to send you {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith. Appreciate their kindness!
We put in a word for you. Gods listened and transferred {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
We trained a [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR] for you. Use his abilities wisely.
[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR] from our camp wants join you. He is available for your orders now.
Fresh recruit for you: [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR].
What about hiring one of our best [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}s[ENDCOLOR]?
We want to join your coalition. Take this [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR]. We would like to show you our devotion!
[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}s[ENDCOLOR] can be really helpful. We prepared one for you.
We've heard you need a [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR]. We can provide you with one!
Welcome! Your appearance in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] amazed us! Become our friend, please!
We are pleased to meet you! Unfortunately we did not expected anybody in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] and we have nothing prepared as a gift. Forgive us!
Welcome to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]!
Greetings mighty leader. You are in best place in the world - [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. It's a shame we cannot give you anything.
What a wonderful day! Welcome to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! You should have announce your arrival. We weren't prepared.
Praise the day! Welcome to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! We would do some preparations, if only we knew...
Praise the gods! We doubted someone will arrive to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We spent anything we had to survive those harsh times.
Ayayay! What a surprise! We're sincerely sorry we cannot give you anything. Please, feel free in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Greetings. We have nothing for you. Walk away from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Hi. Friendship with [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] is all you can afford for now. Appreciate it!
Hello. You entered [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Be careful, we do not want any troubles.
Hi! You have nothing for [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR], so we have nothing for you, too!
Good day. What are you looking for in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
How do you do? Do you like [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
How are you doing? Travel through [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR], and you will change your attitude towards our nation.
Good morning stranger. We want to tell you that [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] are not eager to be involved in any conflict.
Hi. Don't think you get anything from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Halt! Go away from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! We won't give you anything!
Don't move! You are trespassing [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! Turn around and go away!
Huh, another usurper. What do you want from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
Well, well! Do you think [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] will kneel before you?
Two steps back! We have orders to kill anyone approaching [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Do you want to die?
Who are you? We did not expect anyone in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. It will be better if you go away.
Who told you about [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]? We will kill him!
Just nothing.
Here it is our protector. May the gods will be with you!
Greetings our saviour! What we can do for your nation?
Hello our friend! Everything all right with our agreement?
Welcome again mighty ruler! We are happy to see you so powerful!
Gods sent you to that place! We are so safe now!
Welcome again! Long time no see. Do you want to continue our agreement?
Greetings! It's been a while you offered your protection. Our people are frightened by local neighbours!
Good to see you again! We have peace and prosperity under your wings!
Hello again protector! We think about some wider coalition with our neighbours. You could visit them, too.
Ha! We knew you would come soon! And no one believed. Your protection saves our lives!
We're happy to see you again! What we can do for you?
Hello again! What brings you to us?
Greetings! We hope that our relationship is in best condition. Can we do something for you?
Good to see you! Do you want to talk?
What a coincidence! We wanted to talk with you.
Long time no see. Did you manage to fulfil our pleases?
Hello, how are you? Today is a good day to talk.
Nice to see you! Do you want something to eat? You seem to be exhausted. Tell us what happened.
Holy crap, you look like a ghost! What happened? Can we help you somehow?
Brothers and sisters welcome you again! What do you need?
Hello. What brought you here again?
Good day emperor. Do you want something from us?
Hello again. We do not want any troubles. What problems bring you to our city?
Hello. We do what we must to do. Do you?
Greetings. Why such a mighty person visits our city?
Hi. I suppose you need something, again...
Greetings. After your last action, we are not sure we want to cooperate with you. This may bring troubles on us!
Huh, you again. Our neighbours do not trust you. Why we should?
Good morning. How are you? Your presence here is questioned. What do you want from us this time?
Oh, my lord. I thought we understood each other last time. Do we need to explain everything to you again?
Arghh, it's you again! We hoped we will never see you anymore.
Oh, it's you. Don't forget our relationship didn't change since our last meeting.
Well, well, you need something from us? Again?
Huh! You want some help from us? Forget!
Stop! We warned you once! Next time we will kill you!
Warning! You are stepping into restricted area! Identify yourself!
Welcome to Joined Security Area! Do you have something to offer?
We created this secured area to protect our people from you. You've proven we were right.
Don't move! Minefiled in front of you! We've told you to not to show yourself in here!
We thought we can work together. How wrong we were! Better go!
